title: Average annual consumer spending , by type U.S. 2018
summary: The Average annual Spending in the spending by was Spending Food , who made 20091 U.S.
The most annual Spending was Healthcare , with just 1866 U.S.

In second place was Spending Transportation with 9761 U.S. ; third place went to Spending Housing with 20091 U.S. ; fourth place went to Spending Apparel_and_services with 1866 U.S. and fifth place went to Spending Personal_insurance_and_pensions , who was 7296 U.S. .
gold: This statistic shows the average annual expenditures of consumer units in the United States in 2018 , by type . In 2018 , the average U.S. consumer unit spent about 7,923 U.S. dollars on food . The total average U.S. consumer spending amounted to 61,224 U.S. dollars .
